author: Kenneth Shields
comment: I usually stay away from the light color faces. But this app does such a great job feathering into darkness at the bottom. It makes the flat tire just disappear.
title: Very classy.

author: Christopher Dugan
comment: Lovely watch face, easy on the battery too. However, weather doesn't appear to function properly. Incorrect forecast in both auto and manual location mode.
title: Lovely design, especially the battery ring.

author: Jose Armstrong
comment: Too chatty. I constantly putting alerts in your watch.
title: Horrible watchface

author: Mark Davis
comment: Battery abit better but could do with getting a whole day out of it..like it tho any chance to extend battery life some more?? Other than that I really like the faces you guys are coming up with..keep it up.
title: Another good one!

author: jason perez
comment: Nice app, but the biggest reason I wanted this was for the weather, which is NEVER correct.
title: Weather doesn't work right

author: Vae Victus
comment: Very sophisticated styling with everything I need to see at a glance.
title: Excellent design.

author: David Thornton
comment: Dev quick to fix bugs to this beautiful watch face. Not power hungary like some
title: Excellent

author: Antonio Candido
comment: Clear and sleek. Nice sleep mode. It would be nice to have a darker metallic look setting as option

reply.author: Simon Barke
reply.content:
Hi Antonio, thanks a lot for your feedback. :) 
Are you looking for a darker sleep mode or a darker metallic look?

title: Sleek

author: Ken Hicg
comment: This is the face I was looking for. The developer responded quickly to an issue and was helpful.
title: Brilliant
